contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.authorc.AuthorContentBiographyHTML: A Senior Software Engineer, long Time Kentico MVP and now owner of PhysicsClassroom.com.  Trevor's specializes in Developer Enablement, creating many tools and modules over the year to aid partners and users alike.  His most noteworthy contributions are the Kentico 12 to 13 Migration Toolkit, Media Library Migration Toolkit and his Baseline Site Solution which is now available in Xperience by Kentico.  Friendly and always willing to help, you can find him easiest on the Kentico Community Slack Channel.
